overview: The Mistress of Souls will dominate and control their thoughts, their dreams, their erotic desires, their very being. This cunning lesbian madame is an expert in training strong willed sensual teens into becoming submissive Sapphic slaves who will pleasure on demand.
tagline: Her thoughts, her dreams, her desires, are no longer hers
title: Mistress of Souls 2
